helpmusic:
**Command on the Bot**

**Member**
/play: To play the song via YT link or via text
/vplay: to play the video
/lang: to changebot language
/addchat: to add group to bot database and so it can be on the

**Admin**
/pause: to pause the song
/resume: to continue the song
/skip: to continueto the next song
/end: to stop the song
